title: Support & Help
subtitle: Guides for setup, security, and troubleshooting.
contactBody: Please include your workspace name, bot name or ID, a timestamp, a screenshot, and relevant api/runner logs.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.line1: Create a bot by selecting an exchange and a trading pair, then save the configuration and start the bot.
gettingStarted.line2: Tip: use Config Presets to save a known-good setup and apply it to new bots quickly.

exchangeKeys.title: Exchange API Keys
exchangeKeys.line2: Keys are protected; viewing or editing requires Re-Auth (OTP).
exchangeKeys.line3: Common issues: invalid key, IP whitelist not updated, missing trade permissions.

botSettings.title: Bot Settings Explained
botSettings.line1: Futures Strategy: spread, levels, step, distribution, jitter, skew, max skew.
botSettings.line2: Volume Bot: daily target, min/max trade, mode.
botSettings.line3: Risk: min balance, max deviation, max open orders, daily loss.

priceSupport.title: Price Support
priceSupport.line1: When mid price drops below the floor, Price Support buys until mid is back above the floor.
priceSupport.line2: It uses a separate budget and stops automatically when the budget is depleted.
priceSupport.line3: A Telegram notification is sent on depletion, and a manual restart is required.

priceFollow.title: Price Follow (Master / Slave)
priceFollow.line1: The master exchange provides the price feed (no bot required on master).
priceFollow.line2: The slave exchange executes trades based on that master feed.
priceFollow.line3: Stale master feed and deviation protection prevent unsafe orders.

manualTrading.title: Manual Trading
manualTrading.line1: Manual limit and market orders are available if enabled by your admin.
manualTrading.line2: Re-Auth (OTP) is required for manual trading actions.
manualTrading.line3: Market orders include a slippage warning and should be used carefully.

roles.title: Users, Roles & Permissions
roles.line1: Roles include Superadmin, Admin, Operator, and Viewer.
roles.line2: Permissions are configurable per workspace role.
roles.line3: Best practice: use least privilege for day-to-day operations.

security.title: Security
security.line1: Cookie-based sessions are protected with CSRF safeguards.
security.line2: Re-Auth (OTP) is required for sensitive actions.
security.line4: Audit logs help track sensitive changes and actions.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.line1: Bot shows ERROR: check runtime reason, keys, balances, and exchange health.
troubleshooting.line2: No orders: config too strict, price follow deviation, or post-only rejects.
troubleshooting.line3: Runner not updating: check runner status and readiness endpoints.
